headline: Is Texas Instruments (TXN) Pricing Reflect Recent Semiconductor Sentiment Correctly?
summary: If you are looking at Texas Instruments and wondering whether the current share price lines up with the underlying value, you are not alone. The stock last closed at US$188.45, with total returns of 8.6% over 7 days, 5.0% over 30 days, 6.2% year to date, 1.5% over 1 year, 15.9% over 3 years and 26.5% over 5 years, which may signal shifting expectations around growth or risk. Recent coverage of Texas Instruments has focused on its role as a large US semiconductor name and how investors are...
